list_definition.definition: to (cause to) rest on the buttocks; to (cause to) be seated

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He likes sitting on the floor
They sat me in the chair and started asking questions.

list_definition.mean_english: ở vào vị trí nào đó
list_definition.definition: to lie or rest; to have a certain position

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The parcel is sitting on the table.

list_definition.mean_english: là thành viên chính thức của
list_definition.definition: (with on) to be an official member of (a board, committee etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: An owl was sitting in the tree by the window.

list_definition.mean_english: là thí sinh của một kì thi

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Beth sits her geography exam today.

list_definition.mean_english: ngồi làm mẫu để vẽ chân dung
list_definition.definition: to take up a position, or act as a model, in order to have one’s picture painted or one’s photograph taken

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is sitting for a portrait/photograph.

list_definition.definition: (of a committee, parliament etc) to be in session

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Parliament sits from now until Christmas.
